short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The "Tabuddy" extension allows users to easily share bookmarks with their teammates

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The "Tabuddy" extension allows users to easily share bookmarks with their teammates. This extension adds a new "New tab" page to Chrome, which allows users to select specific bookmarks and share them with their teammates through a unique URL. Once shared, teammates can access the shared bookmarks on the "New tab" page, which shows the shared bookmarks. This extension is useful for teams who collaborate on research projects or want to share their website bookmarks with each other.
